# User Variables
set (SUPPORT_FUNCTION_CALL_TRACE 1)

# NO DATA FOR SECTION: Custom additions (begin)

# Common Include
include (${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../common.cmake)

# Files and Build Type
add_executable( hal3-test-app
    QCameraHAL3Base.cpp
    QCameraHAL3VideoTest.cpp
    QCameraHAL3Test.cpp
    QCameraHAL3SnapshotTest.cpp
    QCameraHAL3RawSnapshotTest.cpp
    QCameraHAL3PreviewTest.cpp
    QCameraHAL3MainTestContext.cpp
)

# Libraries to compile
target_link_libraries(hal3-test-app cutils)
target_link_libraries(hal3-test-app log)
target_link_libraries(hal3-test-app camera_client)
target_link_libraries(hal3-test-app utils)
target_link_libraries(hal3-test-app camera_metadata)
target_link_libraries(hal3-test-app dl)
target_link_libraries(hal3-test-app pthread)
target_link_libraries(hal3-test-app hardware)
target_link_libraries(hal3-test-app binder)

# Include Paths
include_directories (${CAMX_C_INCLUDES})
include_directories (../..)
include_directories(${KERNEL_INCDIR}/usr/include)
#include_directories(display/display-hal/libgralloc)

# Dependencies

# Definitions
add_definitions (${CAMX_CFLAGS})
add_definitions (${CAMX_CPPFLAGS})

# NO DATA FOR SECTION: Custom additions (end)

# Auto-Gen
#add_dependencies(camxhal autogen)

install(TARGETS hal3-test-app RUNTIME DESTINATION bin)

if (CONFIG STREQUAL "Debug")
    add_definitions( -g )
endif()
